com.T05.krowdtrialz.util

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.T05.krowdtrialz.util.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles everything to do with reading and writing to firestore database This class is a singleton.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Database.GenerateIDCallback
      For this call back onSuccess indicates that the id does not exist in the database and therefore should be added
      static interface  Database.GetExperimentCallback
      Callback for methods that query for one experiment
      static interface  Database.GetUserCallback
      Callback for methods that query for one user.
      static interface  Database.InitializeDatabaseCallback
      Callback for when initializeInstance is finished.
      static interface  Database.QueryExperimentsCallback
      For this call back onSuccess indicates that at least one result was found

      This method returns a list of experiments where given keyword matches description

      This method returns a list of experiments that are owned by a given user

    • Method Detail

      • initializeInstance

        public static void initializeInstance(android.content.SharedPreferences sharedPreferences,
                                      Database.InitializeDatabaseCallback callback)
        Initializes the single instance. This must be called before getInstance() is called. This should be called from MainActivity when the app starts.
        Parameters:
        sharedPreferences - The app's instance of SharedPreferences.
        callback - Callback to be called when all initialization is finished.

      • getInstance

        public static Database getInstance()
        Gets the single instance of the Database class. This method throws a RuntimeException if it is called before initializeInstance.
        Returns:
        The instance.

      • getExperimentByID

        public void getExperimentByID(java.lang.String expID,
                              Database.GetExperimentCallback callback)
        This gets an experiment of a unique ID
        Parameters:
        expID - An Experiment ID

      • initializeDeviceUser

        public void initializeDeviceUser(Database.InitializeDatabaseCallback callback)
        This initializes a User instance with a unique id associated with this device. To generate the id, this code checks if the device already has an id saved and if not, it generates a unique id and saves it to device and also to the database.

      • getDeviceUser

        public User getDeviceUser()
        Gets a User instance with a unique id associated with this device. In order for this to return the correct User, the app should have called initializeUser first and allowed ample time to confirm the ID with the database.
        Returns:
        The User associated with this device..

      • updateDeviceUser

        public void updateDeviceUser(User user)
        Updates the User instance associated with this device and also updates the user's information in the database. Note: this cannot be used to change the ID associated with this device. The argument "user" should have the same ID as the current user.
        Parameters:
        user - A User instance with updated info

      • getUserById

        public void getUserById(java.lang.String id,
                        Database.GetUserCallback callback)
        Queries for the user associated with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user to search for.
        callback - The callback to be called when the query is finished.

      • verifyUserID

        public void verifyUserID(User user,
                         Database.GenerateIDCallback callback)
        This method checks if user already exits in the database* and returns a new unique id if they don't or existing one if they do

      • addExperiment

        public void addExperiment(Experiment experiment)
        This method adds the given experiment to the database

      • addSubscription

        public void addSubscription(User subscriber,
                            Experiment experiment)
        This method adds the given experiment to the SubscribedExperiments collection in the database and adds its path to the lookups
        Parameters:
        subscriber - This is the user who is subscribing
        experiment - This is the experiment that is being subscribed to

      • addTrial

        public void addTrial(Trial trial,
                     Experiment experiment)
        This method adds the given trial to the given experiment
        Parameters:
        trial - this is the trial to be added
        experiment - this is the experiment that the trial is being added to

      • getExperimentsByOwner

        public void getExperimentsByOwner(User owner,
                                  Database.QueryExperimentsCallback callback)
        This method returns a list of experiments that are owned by a given user
        Parameters:
        owner - This is the user that owns the experiments

      • getExperimentsBySubscriber

        public void getExperimentsBySubscriber(User subscriber,
                                       Database.QueryExperimentsCallback callback)
        This method returns a list of experiments that are subscribed to by a given user
        Parameters:
        subscriber - This is the user that is subscribed to the experiments

      • getExperimentsByDescription

        public void getExperimentsByDescription(java.lang.String keyWord,
                                        Database.QueryExperimentsCallback callback)
        This method returns a list of experiments where given keyword matches description
        Parameters:
        keyWord - This is the search term

      • getExperimentsByTags

        public void getExperimentsByTags(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags,
                                 Database.QueryExperimentsCallback callback)
        This method returns a list of experiments where given tags match description, owner name, owner username, or owner email, region and unit(s)
        Parameters:
        tags - This is the tags to search for

      • updateExperiment

        public void updateExperiment(Experiment experiment)
        This method updates an existing experiment in the database based on id
        Parameters:
        experiment - This is the experiment to be updated

      • deleteExperiment

        public void deleteExperiment(Experiment experiment)
